About Me

Hello! I'm a full-stack developer with a degree in business administration and specialization in finance and the financial market.
Recently, I completed independent Full Stack Development studies and gained proficiency on the client side and on the server side.
I have a huge hunger for knowledge and love learning new things.
My diverse background that includes study in a Yeshiva throughout my childhood and early adulthood.
It instilled in me a strong work ethic and dedication to learning that have been invaluable throughout my career.
Because my yeshiva studies were not included traditional subjects such as English or math, after I finished studying there, I completed the missing studies independently and eventually earned a degree in Business Administration.
I also gained significant experience in my last two positions - owning an import company and team manager at Bezeq International.
These two positions helped me develop skills in project management and problem-solving as well as the ability to work in a team and meet deadlines.

I highly recommend looking at in "Find The Treasury" project which is the most creative and incorporates the most technologies.

Find The Treasure

complete client-side and server-side game called "Find the Treasure", is a multiplayer game that challenges players to build and solve treasure hunts. The project includes various technologies such as massive external API - Leaflet for geo-location and map, GPS and IP address to calculate the player's location, reverse geo location to search for addresses. Authentication and authorization were also implemented. Besides many other small and interesting features.

Links:

Website GitHub-backEnd GitHub-frontEnd about the project
HTML CSS JavaScript React Redux Node.js Express.js MongoDB Mongoose

Mishniyot Beit Menoha

A very interesting project I did for a client.
The members of the Tripolitan community have to read the book "Beit Menoha" on the day of death of their relatives. Everyone reads a section.
In the project I built, each of the relatives can enter the website and receive a part to read that have not yet been read.
The project integrates an external API to complete the relevant text, Server side for managing the division of segments and managing users, Client side that allows opening new calls and tracking existing calls.

Links:

The project is in the final stages and will soon go live

HTML CSS JavaScript React Redux Node.js Express.js MongoDB Mongoose
